tool_description: Optimizes white space distribution throughout the resume to improve readability, visual balance, and professional appearance.

content_density.description: Content density level: light, moderate, or heavy

page_constraints.description: Page limit constraints: one-page, two-page, or flexible

spacing_style.description: Spacing style preference: tight, balanced, or generous

error_messages: Invalid layout structure: Provide valid layout structure from layout designer.
Invalid content density: Use one of [light, moderate, heavy].
Invalid page constraints: Use one of [one-page, two-page, flexible].
Invalid spacing style: Use one of [tight, balanced, generous].
usage: Provide layout structure and content density, optionally specify page constraints and spacing style. Returns detailed white space optimization recommendations.

balance_assessment.description: Assessment of white space balance and distribution
